Html:
Poking around the source code/patch section of the site left me wondering - how can I check to see if a change makes its way into a release?

Thanks!

There's always a checkin for each release, named "RELEASE 2.2.6 - Assembly version and readme updates" or something similar. Anything before that made it into that release.

On occasion, I've forgotten to check that in at the same time, so a couple times it's also had in its description: "NOTE: Only contains up to 12345", which means that the release contained up to checkin #12345.
Huh? That's happened since the beginning of Rawr's existance.
